text: @GregAbbott_TX Why are you allowing CHINA OWNED Business to open in Texas & NOT Local AMERICAN OWNED Businesses?! Put USA & the GREAT Citizens of USA FIRST! China did not elect you, or did they?! Do you work for Citizens of Texas or CHINA? @seanhannity #AmericaFirst #Texas #coronavirus #MAGA
